show_name: Arcadia of My Youth: Endless Orbit SSX (TV)
other_title: Arcadia of My Youth: Infinite Course SSX
Captain Harlock SSX Rotta Verso L'Infinito (Italian)
Waga Seishun no Arcadia: Mugen Kidō SSX (Japanese)
わが青春のアルカディア・無限軌道ＳＳＸ (Japanese)
plot: Set after the events in Arcadia of My Youth, Harlock and his friends, now declared outlaws by the Illumidas-occupied Earth government, search for a paradise where all humanity can be free. Along the voyage, they discover that the Illumidas has occupied other planets in addition to Earth and must battle to put an end to their tyranny, and avoid being captured by the various people trying to hunt them down for reward money offered by the Earth government.
opening_theme: "Oretachi no Funade (おれたちの船出)" by Ichiro Mizuki
ending_theme: "Harlock no Ballad (ハーロックのバラード)" by Ichirou Mizuki
